title: Yagyuu Renya Bugeichou
sinopse:
Toshikane Yagyuu, later known as Renyasai, heads for Edo in order to become the Owari Tokugawa clan's combat instructor. A comic about genuine sword techniques by one of the masters of period dramas!

(Source: Jmanga)

Included one-shot:
Volume 3: Yagyuu Jitsuwa: Oni no Houchou
